reason: POSITIVE: The five connection families listed (c_1<->c_3, c_1<->c_7, c_3<->c_7, c_2<->c_4, {c_2,c_4}<->c_8) correctly match the non-trivial lasso connections in the paper's Section 'Further lassos' (lines 2674-2844).
